import React from 'react'; import "./Blog.css"; import { Container, Row, Col, Table } from "react-bootstrap"; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import DocumentMeta from "react-document-meta"; function MbbsCollegesInPhilippines() { const meta = { title: "Top MBBS Colleges in Philippines for 2020 Admission", description: "Top MBBS Colleges in Philippines for 2020 Admission for Indian Students offers the best facilities & fees comparatively lower than the private medical colleges of India.", canonical: "https://www.mbbsadmissionsinabroad.com/top-10-mbbs-colleges-in-philippines-for-2020-admission", meta: { charset: "utf-8", name: { keywords: "Top MBBS Colleges in Philippines for 2020 Admission", }, }, }; return (

Top MBBS Colleges in Philippines for 2020 Admission

  • AMA School of Medicine
  • University of Perpetual Help
  • Rizal Angeles University Foundation
  • Our Lady of Fatima University
  • Emilio Aguinaldo College of Medicine
  • Bicol Christian College of Medicine
  • Davao Medical School Foundation
  • Xavier University
  • University of the Philippines
  • Manila Saint Louis University
  • Conclusion

AMA School of Medicine

AMA School of Medicine is also known as AMASOM which was founded in 1980. It is one of the best Philippines top 10 medical colleges which is operational since 2008 when it was given permission by CHED to provide the Medical Program equivalent to the MBBS degree.

It is the medical school of AMA Education System in the Philippines which is lodged in AMA College Makati. It is situated at the heart of Makati City in the Philippines. This university is recognized by WHO and MCI. Indian students are provided with a license to practice in India after the MD graduation from the AMA School of Medicine.

Courses details

The AMA School of Medicine Philippines provides quality medical programs under the supervision of highly qualified faculty and state of the art infrastructure. This university is one of the top MBBS colleges in Philippines for Indian students that provide medical programs (MBBS/MD).

Admission procedure in AMA School of Medicine

The Admission procedure for AMA School of Medicine Philippines (AMASOM Philippines) is on the basis of a round of counseling and academic progress. The students are advised to read the mentioned points to avoid any kind of rejection.

  • The students need to fill the Application form with their appropriate details online on the university’s portal.
  • They need to submit the required documents & wait for the application review process.
  • When the eligible students receive an offer letter, they need to pay the University fees.
  • After paying the MBBS fees, the students can apply for the Visa.
  • Now, the students are all set to book a flight to the Philippines.
Facilities provided at AMA School of Medicine

MD program at AMA School of Medicine aims to produce competent medical practitioners that last for a duration of 6 years. It provides the following facilities:

  • This University has many facilities that are used for the advancement of students’ clinical and practical skills.
  • It has laboratories for Histology, Microbiology, Parasitology, and Pathology.
  • This university has an excellent system of hostel accommodation.
  • The hostel is fully-furnished and air-conditioned.
Faculty & Staff in AMA School of Medicine

AMA School of Medicine offers a good ratio of well trained and highly educated faculty members equipped with all the modern technology. It also provides sufficient numbers of non-technical staff to provide an ambiance of self-learning to the students.

Why study in Philippines for Indian students

MBBS in the Philippines for Indian Students is the best destination because of the following reasons:

  • High education standard
  • The university follows the international standard of education.
  • Low-cost MBBS education.
  • Integrated MBBS curriculum with an ideal student-faculty ratio.
  • Clinically oriented method of teaching & learning.
Fees Structure
Course Tuition Fees in INR
BS Course (1st Year) 3,81,000
BS Course (2nd Year) 2,58,000
MD I Course (1st Year) 3,18,000
MD II Course (2nd Year) 3,18,000
MD III Course (3rd Year) 1,91,000
MD IV Course (4th Year) 1,28,900
University of Perpetual Help

The University of Perpetual Help is also known as The University of Perpetual Help System DALTA (UPHSD) which was founded in 1975. It is the Philippines top 10 medical college because of its quality education and state-of-the-art facilities. It is a highly recognized university in the Philippines and accredited by CHED, the Philippines, WHO, MCI, Medical Board of California (USA), FAIMER.

This University is one of the top MBBS colleges in Philippines for Indian students because of its creativity, discovery, education, hospitality, and innovation. It includes three major campuses in the Philippines such as Calamba, Las Pinas, Molino. It comprises of 6 departments as given-below:

  • Faculty of Medicine
  • Faculty of Arts and Humanities
  • Faculty of Business and Social Studies
  • Faculty of Language and Culture
  • Faculty of Engineering
  • Faculty of Science and Technology.
Courses details

The University of Perpetual Help provides the following courses:

  • MBBS
  • Bachelor in Architecture
  • AB in communication and media
  • Aircrafts mechanics technology
  • Aviation electronics technology
  • BS in accountancy
  • BS in civil engineering
Admission procedure in University of Perpetual Help
  • The students must have passed class 12th or intermediate exam with at least 50% marks in Physics, Chemistry, and Biology or biotechnology for taking admission to MBBS in Philippines 2020
  • The students must have an English subject in class XII.
  • The students hold a three-year full-time Bachelor’s Degree or Diploma in a medical or medical-related subject like Nursing, Physiotherapy, Psychology, Medical Lab Technician, B.Sc in Biology, which is equal to a pre-medical course are eligible to apply for direct admission to the 4-year medical course.
  • The students applying for a 4-year medical course can go to the Philippines and give NMAT in March / April & on successful completion of NMAT can join the MD course in June.
Facilities provided at University of Perpetual Help

The University of Perpetual Help is the top MBBS colleges in Philippines for Indian students which provide the following facilities:

  • The University of Perpetual Help has many lecture halls, laboratories, library, hostel, canteens, playground, and hospitals to provide under the roof all the amenities for the medical students.
  • It has 300 bedded hospitals named the University Of Perpetual Help Dalta Medical Center within the campus.
  • The University has affiliated with several top hospitals in Manila.
Faculty & Staff of University of Perpetual Help

The University of Perpetual Help has dedicated and qualified faculty, research and development, and the cutting edge infrastructure that provides high quality. Four hectares spread campus shows its enormous popularity and the state of the art facilities for the medical students.

Why study in Philippines for Indian students

Most of the students take admission in the Philippines to pursue MBBS because of the following reasons:

  • No donation and capitation fee is required for admission
  • No entrance exam is required for admission
  • Low university fees
  • The facility of fully furnished hotels with the availability of Indian food
  • State-of-the-art-infrastructure which makes the study MBBS in the Philippines more productive
  • This university has one of the highest MCI and USMLE exam passing rates
Fees Structure
Course Tuition Fees in INR
Academic Year (Pre Medical-BS Course 1.8 Years) 6,25,000
MBBS / MD I Course (2nd Year) 5,84,000
MBBS / MD II Course (3rd Year) 3,26,000
MBBS / MD III Course (4th Year) 1,95,000
MBBS / MD IV Course (5th Year) 1,95,000
Total 19,25,000(Actual cost may vary due to currency fluctuations)
Rizal Angeles University Foundation

Angeles University Foundation is a Roman Catholic University located in Angeles City, Philippines. It is one of the best Philippines top 10 medical college which is an Educational Institute established in 1962.

Angeles University Foundation is the top MBBS colleges in Philippines for Indian students as it is a pioneer in health science education in the Philippines. The duration of a Medical degree in the Angeles University Foundation is 6 years which includes 5 years of MBBS course and 1 year of internship. This university is recognized by the Medical Council of India (MCI) and the World Health Organization (WHO).

Courses details

Angeles University Foundation provides the following courses:

  • MBBS
  • Bachelor of Elementary Education
  • BS in Medical Technology
  • BS in Nursing
  • BS in Occupational Therapy
  • BS in Pharmacy
  • BS in Computer Engineering
  • BS in Computer Science
  • BS in Information Technology
Admission procedure in Angeles University Foundation
  • The students should apply to the MBBS course after completing 12th with Biology.
  • They must have an aggregate of 50% in Physics, Chemistry, and Biology.
  • The students should also qualify for the NEET exam with passing marks to apply for MBBS in the Philippines.
  • The students should have English subject in their higher secondary.
Facilities provided at Angeles University Foundation

Angeles University Foundation is the top MBBS colleges in Philippines for Indian students which provide the following facilities:

  • The Infrastructure of is Angeles University Foundation consists of laboratories and education equipment make the university the most prestigious Institution of medical studies
  • The environment of the Angeles University Foundation campus is safe and calm.
  • All essential facilities are provided to the students such as Indian food, accommodation, and wifi, etc.
Faculty & Staff of Angeles University Foundation

Angeles University Foundation is offering high standard education with highly qualified teaching staff. This university is MCI approved and the degree from this university accepted across the globe.

Why study in Philippines for Indian students

Most of the students wish to study in the Philippines because of the following reasons:

  • Low fee structure.
  • It has International cooperation with various nations.
  • Simple admission procedure to the MBBS course.
  • No requirement for any donations and capitation fees
  • Extremely safe for Indian students and the environment is also safe.
  • The medium of instruction is English.
Fees Structure
Particular Annual Fee
Fee in USD (approx) 5779.48 USD
Fee in Indian Rupees (approx) 4,27,586 INR
Hostel in Rupees (approx) 80,000 INR
Total Fee 5,07,586 INR
Our Lady of Fatima University

Our Lady of Fatima University is one of the top MBBS colleges in Philippines for Indian students which was established in 1967. Almost 30,000 medical practitioners from all disciplines are graduated from this university.

The university has five buildings with sophisticated and latest medical laboratory equipment that meets the standards of the Board of Medical Education. This university is recognized by the Medical Council of India (MCI) and the World Health Organization (WHO).

Courses details

Our Lady of Fatima University provides the following courses:

  • MBBS
  • Internal Medicine
  • General Surgery
  • Emergency Medicine
  • Pediatrics
  • Radiology
  • Obstetrics & Gynecology
  • Anesthesia
  • Dermatology
  • Clinical Pathology
  • Orthopedics
  • ENT
Admission procedure in Our Lady of Fatima University
  • The students must have obtained an aggregate of 50% marks in Physics, Chemistry, and Biology.
  • The students must have passed all subjects in 12th standard and English is a compulsory subject.
  • The students are not required to give any kind of entrance exams such as IELTS/TOEFL/GMAT for taking admission to the MBBS course.
Facilities provided at Our Lady of Fatima University

Our Lady of Fatima University is the top MBBS colleges in Philippines for Indian students which provide the following facilities:

  • It has a computer laboratory that is equipped with internet access to facilitate networking of all medical students and research work in medicine.
  • It provides the best facilities in the campus such as conference and seminar rooms, classrooms, lecture halls, research and teaching laboratories, library facilities with audiovisual monitors.
Faculty & Staff of Our Lady of Fatima University

Our Lady of Fatima University has expert medical professors that focuses on the updates correlated with the changes in science, technology, and the social surroundings so as they can deliver the best knowledge to the medical students of the university and deliver the world-class medical practitioners.

Why study in Philippines for Indian students

Below are some of the benefits of studying in the Philippines for Indian students:

  • It provides practical and theory of MBBS education.
  • The campus provides a great environment for the students.
  • No requirement for the entrance exam to join the MBBS course.
  • No requirement of capitation or donation fee.
  • Affordable college fee.
  • The university is beautiful and provides a safe environment for Indian students.
Fees Structure
Course Tuition Fees in INR
BS Course (1st Year) 6,50,000
BS Course (2nd Year) 2,27,500
MD I Course (1st Year) 4,16,000
MD II Course (2nd Year) 4,16,000
MD III Course (3rd Year) 4,16,000
MD IV Course (4th Year) 4,16,000
Emilio Aguinaldo College of Medicine

Emilio Aguinaldo College of Medicine is one of the top MBBS colleges in Philippines for Indian students established in 2001. It has a Pre Medicine Campus at Cavite and College of Medicine campus at Manila. This university is listed with MCI, WHO, and FAIMER.

This Philippines top 10 medical college provides the 5 years of BS+MBBS course at a reasonable fee in the capital city of the Philippines. The students are eligible to work as doctor in any of the countries in the world after completing the MBBS from Emilio Aguinaldo College of Medicine but they need to pass the screening test of the respective country.

Courses details

Emilio Aguinaldo College of Medicine provides the following courses:

  • Medicine
  • Pharmacy
  • Dentistry
  • Nursing
  • Physical Therapy
  • Respiratory Therapy
Admission procedure in Emilio Aguinaldo College of Medicine
  • The students should be at least 17 years of age as of December 31 for taking admission to MBBS in Philippines 2020.
  • They should have science in their 12th standard and should have an aggregate of 50% marks in physics, chemistry, and Biology.
  • The students should have English subject in their higher secondary.
Facilities provided at Emilio Aguinaldo College of Medicine

Emilio Aguinaldo College of Medicine is the top MBBS colleges in Philippines for Indian students which provide the following facilities:

  • Emilio Aguinaldo College of Medicine has well-equipped classrooms, basic science and skills laboratories, and a library.
  • It provides a facility of fully furnished hostels with Indian food.
  • The students get to study in a safe environment.
Faculty & Staff of Emilio Aguinaldo College of Medicine

Emilio Aguinaldo College of Medicine has dedicated and highly experienced faculty members. It has an affiliation with various hospitals. It provides the superior quality of teaching by the expert professor and clinical facilities of its own hospitals. The university follows US education system and English medium for teaching.

Why study in Philippines for Indian students

Below are some of the benefits of studying in the Philippines for Indian students:

  • No donation or capitation fee is required for admission.
  • No requirement for any entrance exam.
  • Emilio Aguinaldo College has low fees for MBBS.
  • Students are provided with a 24 hours library facility for reading.
  • It offers abundant scholarships for international students.
  • There is no language barrier to study MBBS as English is the medium for instruction.
  • The college has a hospital for the best of the practice for students in the college campus itself.
Fees Structure
Academic Year Tuition Fees in Pesos
Pre-Medical (16 months) 3,47,222
MD I Course (1st Year) 2,36,111
MD II Course (2nd Year) 2,36,111
MD III Course (3rd Year) 2,36,111
MD IV Course (4th Year) 2,36,111
Bicol Christian College of Medicine

The Bicol Christian College of Medicine is one of the best Philippines top 10 medical college which was founded in 1980. It is an accredited member of the Foundation of the Advancement of International Medical Education & Research and also internationally registered with the WHO.

Bicol Christian College of Medicine is one of the top MBBS colleges in Philippines for Indian students to pursue MBBS because it has gained number one in producing the best and brightest medical professionals in the Bicol Region of the Philippines. The medium of coaching MBBS in this college is English.

Courses details

Bicol Christian College of Medicine provides the following courses:

  • Laboratory Techniques
  • Medicine
  • Nursing
  • Radiology
  • Dentistry
Admission procedure in Bicol Christian College of Medicine
  • The students must have an aggregate of 50% marks in Physics, Chemistry, and Biology.
  • The students must have passed all subjects in 12th standard.
  • The students should have English subject in their higher secondary.
  • The students are not required to give any kind of entrance exams such as IELTS/TOEFL/GMAT for taking admission to MBBS in Philippines 2020.
Facilities provided at Bicol Christian College of Medicine

Bicol Christian College of Medicine is the top MBBS colleges in Philippines for Indian students which provide the following facilities:

  • Bicol Christian College of Medicine has all the academic resources and facilities to offer quality education to the students through classroom lectures and experiments in the laboratory.
  • It has a library and a top-class e-laboratory.
  • This college has also well-equipped laboratory and provides traditional and problem-based learning.
Why study in Philippines for Indian students

Bicol Christian College of Medicine has excellent, highly experienced staff in the Medical field and is very cooperative. The students are free to consult any professor if they have wedged in the query correlated with the medical subject. The English medium is used for theory, practical, instructions, seminars and communication.

Why study in Philippines for Indian students

Below are some of the benefits of studying in the Philippines for Indian students:

  • Bicol Christian College of Medicine has a vast and rich collection of medical books, journals, and research papers which is most beneficial for the students.
  • It provides Indian food and accommodation services to the students.
  • Simple procedure for taking admission to MBBS in Philippines 2020.
  • The fees for MBBS at Bicol Christian College of Medicine are the lowest among medical colleges in the Philippines.
  • The medium of instruction in this college is English language.
Fees Structure
Academic Year Tuition Fees in INR
Pre-Medical (16 months) 4,32,000
MD I Course (1st Year) 2,16,000
MD II Course (2nd Year) 2,16,000
MD III Course (3rd Year) 2,16,000
MD IV Course (4th Year) 2,16,000
Davao Medical School Foundation

Davao Medical School Foundation is one of the best Philippines top 10 medical college which was established in 1976. It is the first medical college situated in the city of Mindanao. The medium of instruction in this college is English. The duration of a medical degree in the Philippines is 6 years which includes 5 years of MBBS course and 1 year of internship.

Davao Medical School Foundation is the top MBBS colleges in Philippines for Indian students because they get clinical training at the southern Philippines medical centre. Its academic programs seek to equip students with the expertise, skills, and abilities that integrate specialized study in different academic fields.

Courses details

Davao Medical School Foundation provides the following courses:

  • Bachelor of Science in Biology
  • Doctor of Medicine
  • Doctor of Dental Medicine
  • Master in Health Professionals Education
  • Master in Community Health
  • Master in Participatory Development
  • Bachelor of Science in Midwifery
Admission procedure in Davao Medical School Foundation
  • The students should have science in their 12th standard and should have an aggregate of 50% marks in physics, chemistry, and Biology.
  • The students should be at least 17 years of age to take admission to MBBS in Philippines 2020
  • The students should also qualify for the NEET exam with passing marks to apply for MBBS in Philippines 2020
  • The students should have English subject in their higher secondary.
Facilities provided at Davao Medical School Foundation

Davao Medical School Foundation is the top MBBS colleges in Philippines for Indian students which provide the following facilities:

  • It provides the hostels to all medical students coming from different parts of the world.
  • It has a reasonable hostel system with fully furnished rooms.
  • It provides all essential amenities to the students.
Faculty & Staff of Davao Medical School Foundation

Davao Medical School Foundation has the best and experienced faculty that focuses on developing the practical skill of the student. The university offers human and integral health sciences education and services with an emphasis on primary health care in the complementation of instruction, research, patient, and community health care.

Why study in Philippines for Indian students

Below are some of the benefits of studying in the Philippines for Indian students:

  • Davao Medical School University ranked at 134th position among top MBBS colleges in Philippines for Indian students.
  • It is recognized by MCI & WHO.
  • It has English medium of teaching.
  • Good connection with the worldwide reputed medical universities.
  • Safe place to study MBBS course.
  • Problem-based learning methodology.
  • Affordable MBBS fees structure
Fees Structure
Academic Year Tuition Fees in $
MD I Course (1st Year) 5100
MD II Course (2nd Year) 5100
MD III Course (3rd Year) 5100
MD IV Course (4th Year) 5100
MD V Course (5th Year) 5100
Xavier University

Xavier University is one of the great Philippines top 10 medical college which was established in 1940. It provides courses and programs leading to officially recognized higher education degrees like bachelor degrees, master degrees, and doctorate degrees in various areas of study.

Xavier University is one of the top MBBS colleges in Philippines for Indian students who want to study low-cost MBBS in Philippines at MCI approved medical colleges. The MD degree awarded by Xavier University is recognized by the Medical Council of India (MCI).

Courses details

Xavier University provides quality courses and medical programs under the supervision of highly qualified faculty and state of the art infrastructure. This university is one of the top MBBS colleges in Philippines for Indian students that offer bachelor degrees, master degrees, and doctorate degrees in various areas of study.

Admission procedure in Xavier University
  • The students should apply to the MBBS course after completing 12th with Biology.
  • They must have an aggregate of 50% in Physics, Chemistry, and Biology.
  • The students should have English subject in their higher secondary.
  • The students should be at least 17 years of age to take admission to MBBS in Philippines 2020
Facilities provided at Xavier University

Xavier University is the top MBBS colleges in Philippines for Indian students which provide the following facilities:

  • This university has an excellent system of hostel accommodation.
  • The environment of the Xavier University campus is safe and calm.
  • It provides the best facilities in the campus such as conference and seminar rooms, classrooms, lecture halls, research and teaching laboratories, library facilities with audiovisual monitors.
Faculty & Staff of Xavier University

Xavier University has expert medical professors that follow a practical based curriculum similar to the United States education pattern that provides hands-on training to future healthcare professionals to compete at the world standard and opens several opportunities.

Why study in Philippines for Indian students

Below are some of the benefits of studying in the Philippines for Indian students:

  • The campus provides a great environment for the students.
  • No requirement for the entrance exam to join the MBBS in Philippines 2020.
  • No requirement of capitation or donation fee.
  • Affordable college fee.
  • Medium of instruction is English
  • Advanced teaching techniques with outstanding facilities equipped with the well-established infrastructure
Fees Structure
Academic Year Tuition Fees in $
MD I Course (1st Year) 5000
MD II Course (2nd Year) 5000
MD III Course (3rd Year) 5000
MD IV Course (4th Year) 5000
MD V Course (5th Year) 5000
University of the Philippines

University of the Philippines is one of the great Philippines top 10 medical college which was founded in 2008. It offers an MBBS course at low tuition fees for Indian students with a high quality of education.

It is one of the top MBBS colleges in Philippines for Indian students which is approved by the MCI and also listed in the World Health Organization (WHO). It provides the students to have brighter career opportunities after completion of MBBS.

Courses details

University of the Philippines provides the following courses:

  • General Medicine
  • Pharmacy
  • Pediatrics
  • Dentistry
  • Nursing
Admission procedure in University of the Philippines
  • The students must have an aggregate of 50% marks in Physics, Chemistry, and Biology.
  • The students must have passed all subjects in 12th standard.
  • The students should have English subject in their higher secondary.
  • The students are not required to give any kind of entrance exams such as IELTS/TOEFL/GMAT for taking admission to MBBS in Philippines 2020.
Facilities provided at University of the Philippines

University of the Philippines is the top MBBS colleges in Philippines for Indian students which provide the following facilities:

  • University of the Philippines has all the academic resources and facilities to offer quality education to the students through classroom lectures and experiments in the laboratory.
  • It has a library and a top-class e-laboratory.
  • This college has also well-equipped laboratory and provides traditional and problem-based learning.
Faculty & Staff of University of the Philippines

University of the Philippines has highly experienced staff in the Medical field. This university is MCI approved and the degree from this university accepted across the globe. The English medium is used for theory, practice, and instructions.

Why study in Philippines for Indian students

Below are some of the benefits of studying in the Philippines for Indian students:

  • Low fee structure
  • It provides Indian food and accommodation services to the students.
  • Simple procedure for taking admission to MBBS in Philippines 2020.
  • The medium of instruction in this college is the English language.
  • No requirement for any donations and capitation fees
Fees Structure
Academic Year Tuition Fees in INR
MD I Course (1st Year) 2,15,000
MD II Course (2nd Year) 2,15,000
MD III Course (3rd Year) 2,15,000
MD IV Course (4th Year) 2,15,000
Manila Saint Louis University

Saint Louis University is a private Catholic university and one of the great Philippines top 10 medical college which is located in the city of Baguio, Philippines. It is the largest university north of Manila. It provides the magnificent theoretical as well as practical education which empowers the students to become successful practitioners.

The MBBS course offered to students in Saint Louis University is known as the MD program (Doctor of Medicine). The best part of taking admission to Saint Louis University is that the medium of instruction is English.

Courses details

Saint Louis University provides the following courses:

  • Medicine
  • Pharmacy
  • Physical Therapy
  • Dentistry
  • Nursing
  • Respiratory Therapy
Admission procedure in Saint Louis University
  • The students should be at least 17 years of age as of December 31 for taking admission to MBBS in Philippines 2020.
  • They should have science in their 12th standard and should have an aggregate of 50% marks in physics, chemistry, and Biology.
  • The students should have English subject in their higher secondary.
Facilities provided at Saint Louis University

Saint Louis University is the top MBBS colleges in Philippines for Indian students which provide the following facilities:

  • Saint Louis University has well-equipped classrooms, basic science and skills laboratories, and a library.
  • It provides a facility of fully furnished hostels with Indian food.
  • The students get to study in a safe environment.
Faculty & Staff of Saint Louis University

Emilio Aguinaldo College of Medicine has dedicated and highly experienced faculty members. It provides the superior quality of teaching by the expert professor and clinical facilities. The university follows US education system and English medium for teaching.

Why study in Philippines for Indian students

Below are some of the benefits of studying in the Philippines for Indian students:

  • No donation or capitation fee is required for admission.
  • No requirement for any entrance exam.
  • It has low fees for MBBS.
  • Students are provided with a 24 hours library facility for reading.
  • There is no language barrier to study MBBS as English is the medium for instruction.
Fees Structure
Academic Year Tuition Fees in Pesos
MD I Course (1st Year) 2,42,000
MD II Course (2nd Year) 2,42,000
MD III Course (3rd Year) 2,42,000
MD IV Course (4th Year) 2,42,000
Conclusion

MBBS in Philippines is one of the best destinations for Indian students to study course of medicine. Every year, large numbers of students take admission to the above-mentioned Top 10 MBBS Colleges in Philippines. All these colleges are recognized by MCI & WHO. They provide the students to have brighter career opportunities after completion of MBBS from these colleges. The cost of completing MBBS course in these colleges is quite affordable and there is no donation fee or capitation fee required to take admission in these colleges.
